After you add all of the lines, issue the subcommand FILE to save the changes and quit XEDIT: ====> FILE 4. Send the directory entry to DirMaint for processing: ===> dirm add lnxserv1 Chapter 6. Configuring z/VM 239 5. Enable the automatic logon of the ID during system start-up: ===> dirmaint for autolog1 xautolog add lnxserv1 ... DVHREQ2289I Your XAUTOLOG request for AUTOLOG1 at * has completed; with RC=0 Allow several minutes for any DirMaint asynchronous processing of LNXSERV1 to complete. 6.16.3 Generating the SFS file pool for Linux guest systems Now that LNXSERV1 is built, generate the file pool that will run under it. This file pool is named LNX. Complete the following steps: 1. Log on to LNXSERV1 on the first member.
